_meta.source: Freeport tourism resources, Bahamas Ministry of Tourism, cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Freeport, Port Lucaya, and Lucayan National Park area

label_overrides.deadmans-reef: Deadman's Reef (shore snorkeling - 5 min from Port Lucaya)
label_overrides.gold-rock-beach: Gold Rock Beach (Lucayan National Park - 30 min from port)
label_overrides.garden-of-the-groves: Garden of the Groves (12-acre botanical garden)
label_overrides.peterson-cay-national-park: Peterson Cay National Park (boat access - snorkeling)
label_overrides.taino-beach: Taino Beach (popular beach close to port)
label_overrides.count-basie-square: Count Basie Square (live music at Port Lucaya)

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Port Lucaya
transit_routes.note: Taxis wait at cruise terminal. Set rates to major destinations.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Gold Rock Beach
transit_routes.note: Negotiate price before departure. Worth the trip for pristine beach.

featured_experiences.name: Snorkeling Deadman's Reef
featured_experiences.note: Gear rental $10-15 at Port Lucaya. Wade from beach to reef. Shallow water (3-10 feet).

featured_experiences.name: Gold Rock Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Park entry ~$5. Taxi roundtrip ~$40-50. Go early to avoid cruise ship tours.

featured_experiences.name: Swimming with Pigs
featured_experiences.note: Tours $100-150 per person. Book through cruise ship or local operators.
